resources.string:
Preprocess the incoming number before it\'s checked by the rules, making it possible to modify rules on the fly.

This action must be the first one in the workflow, such a workflow will be automatically triggered by an incoming call.

A typical workflow setup:
- Call Event
- Modify Number
The incoming number %s is modified to %s.

Modify the incoming call number before it\'s checked by the rules.

A use case:
  Some mobile network operators support dual numbers for the same SIM card, they add extra leading digits to the secondary number.
  For example: 3312345679 may become 1233312345679.
  The leading 123 needs to be removed before it\'s checked.

A typical setup:
- Call Event
- Replace Number
  from: ^123
  to: leave as empty

There are four built-in notification channels:

None  
  No notification at all.

Blocked  
  Appears in the status bar and notification shade.

Allowed  
  Appears in the status bar, notification shade, and as heads-up pop-up with a sound.

SMS Chat  
  Same as Allowed but without the sound, as the sound may be annoying during active chats.
  It\'s considered active chatting when the screen is unlocked and the SMS app is in the foreground.

This ID will appear in system settings as the notification channel.

Once created, the ID cannot be edited.

When left empty, notifications are automatically grouped into three categories:

- Spam call
- Spam SMS
- Valid SMS

If a group is specified, they will be grouped separately.

Limitation
Due to the Android restriction, the notification sound can only be set when creating a new channel, once it\'s created, it can only be modified in system settings.

Custom Sound
Some phones allow direct import of custom ringtones via the app. For others, import through system settings and then select it in the app.

The ARGB color value, represented in decimal format.

Leave it empty for auto choosing colors.

For example:
The decimal value of 0xFF0000 is 16711680.

Create a new notification channel.

Long tap a notification channel in this dropdown list to edit it.

This channel is currently used by following rules.

%s

Make sure to update them after deleting this channel.
The notification channel will be silenced by force, even if it\'s configured as high importance.

The ARGB color value, represented in decimal format.

For example:
The decimal value of 0xFF0000 is 16711680.
